title: Titanic
summary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Earthquake
summary: Various interconnected people struggle to survive when an earthquake of unimaginable magnitude hits Los Angeles, California.

title: Aftershock
summary: The epic story of a family separated as a result of the Great Tangshan Earthquake of 1976.

title: Only the Brave
summary: Based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, a group of elite firefighters who risk everything to protect a town from a historic wildfire.

title: Alive
summary: After crash-landing in the snowswept Andes, a Uruguayan rugby team has no choice but to turn to desperate measures in order to survive.
